About.title: About Me
About.heading: Passion for code, obsession with details.
About.description: Hi, I'm Kacper — a frontend developer from Toruń. I build fast and accessible sites in React/Next.js, caring about SEO, performance and clean code. Every day I study computer science at UMK, and after hours I test ideas at hackathons and while traveling (I like coding where the cafe has good internet and even better coffee). I like projects where design meets usability: clear navigation, decent Lighthouse and real impact on business.
